text: Juankoski is a town in Northern Savonia, Finland. About 5,000 people lived there in January 2014. The municipalities next to it are Juuka, Kaavi, Kuopio, Rautavaara and Tuusniemi. Since 2017, it was merged into the city of Kuopio. == Other websites == * Juankoski website Category:North Savo Category:Former municipalities of Finland
title: Juankoski
